item.title: About Us
item.description:
,

About Us

,

Our Mission: We create, develop, educate with and preserve sustainable space for media artists and arts organizations in marginalized communities. We want to create jobs and living spaces for these communities.

,

Our method: Collaborate with other organizations and professionals that stay true to our mission and use the tools of real estate development to create places where artists can live and work.

,

Our reason: We want to address the need for economic development and homelessness. Plus, we love entertainment and want to make it better!

item.title: Contact
item.description:
Contact

,

Pardon our dust as we are getting acclimated to our new grid.io home.

,

We will periodically update our website with events and news.

,

Please shoot us an email to the address listed if you have any questions and want to learn more.

,

We’re always looking for production companies and industry employers looking to participate with us and both young and old candidates interested in becoming board members and volunteers.

,Send us a Message

item.title: Donate!
item.description:
,

Donate!

,

A donation to Doing Entertainment Negligence gives us the ability to begin operations, support various programs throughout the year—and keep the lights on. We’re a nonprofit, we don’t charge for our program, so any contribution helps us get closer to completing our mission of getting people information, beginning operations, and creating creative jobs. We sincerely thank you for your generosity.

,
